mapper.select: select count(comment_id) from 13_t_comment where board_id = #{boardId} and write_no = #{writeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into comment (board_no, write_no, comment_id, nick_name, content, write_date, update_date ) values (#{boardId}, #{writeNo}, , #{content}, #{nickName}, #{content}, now(), update_date)
mapper.update: update 13_t_comment set comment_id = #{comment_id}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, content = #{content}, write_date = #{write_date}, update_date = now() where board_id = #{boardId} and write_no = #{write_no} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
